page.title: 09PUBLIC OPINIONS
page.content: From our information of Bulkington most people thought it was litter free, but a small and friendly place to shop. They said there ought to be more entertainment for children. There are more farms than there should be. The biggest shop is the CO_OP where most people shop, if not they shop at Bedworth, Coventry or Nuneaton. Most people have a car for transport and think Bulkington is a pleasant place to live in. Most people in Bulkington worry about money and jobs. Altogether most people liked Bulkington. Most people lived in either semi_detached or a bungalow. There is not much they would like to change in Bulkington except for the lack of entertainment.
